subject: Exclusive iPhone Interview Up Now!
body:
Here it is!  The exclusive, pre-release scoop and dish tell-all interview with Mac expert Shawn King that reveals everything you  wanted to know about the iPhone, including the bad things that they 
 don't want you to know about it!

 Go here to listen to the interview:

http://www.ThreeThingsYouShouldKnow.com/

 And go here to read the companion article about the 7 bad things 
 about the iPhone that they don't want you to know:

http://www.TheInternetPatrol.com/7-bad-things-about-the-iphone-they-dont-want-you-to-know

 This exclusive pre-release interview brought to you by

 The Internet Patrol and Three Things You Should Know
  

The Internet Patrol, 
302 W. El Camino Real, #411, 
Sunnyvale, CA 94087, USA
